description: A Flask route module implementing a health check endpoint using Flask-Smorest Blueprint and MethodView.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class providing a health check endpoint that returns a JSON message indicating service health.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON indicating service health.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
